1: שִׁמְע֞וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> הַדָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>this word</n> הַזֶּ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> פָּר֤וֹת <sup>6510 </sup> <n>ye kine</n> הַבָּשָׁן֙ <sup>1316 </sup> <n>of Bashan</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בְּהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>that [are] in the mountain</n> שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n> הָעֹשְׁק֣וֹת <sup>6231 </sup> <n>which oppress</n> דַּלִּ֔ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> הָרֹצְצ֖וֹת <sup>7533 </sup> <n>which crush</n> אֶבְיוֹנִ֑ים <sup>34 </sup> <n>the needy</n> הָאֹמְרֹ֥ת <sup>559 </sup> <n>which say</n> לַאֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>113 </sup> <n>to their masters</n> הָבִ֥יאָה <sup>935 </sup> <n>Bring</n> וְנִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and let us drink</n>
2: נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>hath sworn</n> אֲדֹנָ֤י <sup>136 </sup> <n>The Lord</n> יְהוִה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> בְּקָדְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>by his holiness</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> יָמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>that lo the days</n> בָּאִ֣ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> וְנִשָּׂ֤א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>upon you that he will take you away</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> בְּצִנּ֔וֹת <sup>6793 </sup> <n>with hooks</n> וְאַחֲרִיתְכֶ֖ן <sup>319 </sup> <n>and your posterity</n> בְּסִיר֥וֹת <sup>5518 </sup> <n>hooks</n> דּוּגָֽה׃ <sup>1729 </sup> <n>fish</n>
3: וּפְרָצִ֥ים <sup>6556 </sup> <n>at the breaches</n> תֵּצֶ֖אנָה <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And ye shall go out</n> אִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>every</n> נֶגְדָּ֑הּ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>straight</n> וְהִשְׁלַכְתֶּ֥נָה <sup>7993 </sup> <n>[cow at that which is] before her and ye shall cast</n> הַהַרְמ֖וֹנָה <sup>2038 </sup> <n>[them] into the palace</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
4: בֹּ֤אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Come</n> בֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <sup>1008 </sup> <n>to Bethel</n> וּפִשְׁע֔וּ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>and transgress</n> הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>at Gilgal</n> הַרְבּ֣וּ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>multiply</n> לִפְשֹׁ֑עַ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>transgression</n> וְהָבִ֤יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and bring</n> לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <sup>1242 </sup> <n>every morning</n> זִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>2077 </sup> <n>your sacrifices</n> לִשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>after three</n> יָמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>years</n> מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>4643 </sup> <n>[and] your tithes</n>
5: וְקַטֵּ֤ר <sup>6999 </sup> <n>And offer</n> מֵֽחָמֵץ֙ <sup>2557 </sup> <n>with leaven</n> תּוֹדָ֔ה <sup>8426 </sup> <n>a sacrifice of thanksgiving</n> וְקִרְא֥וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and proclaim</n> נְדָב֖וֹת <sup>5071 </sup> <n>the free offerings</n> הַשְׁמִ֑יעוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[and] publish</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֵ֤ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>for this</n> אֲהַבְתֶּם֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>liketh</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>you O ye children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n>
6: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אֲנִי֩ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נָתַ֨תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I also have given</n> לָכֶ֜ם נִקְי֤וֹן <sup>5356 </sup> <n>you cleanness</n> שִׁנַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>8127 </sup> <n>of teeth</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> עָ֣רֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in all your cities</n> וְחֹ֣סֶר <sup>2640 </sup> <n>and want</n> לֶ֔חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מְקוֹמֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in all your places</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>yet have ye not returned</n> עָדַ֖י <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to Me</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>unto me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
7: וְגַ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Furthermore</n> אָנֹכִי֩ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מָנַ֨עְתִּי <sup>4513 </sup> <n>And also I have withholden</n> מִכֶּ֜ם <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגֶּ֗שֶׁם <sup>1653 </sup> <n>the rain</n> בְּע֨וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>from you when [there were] yet three</n> חֳדָשִׁים֙ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>months</n> לַקָּצִ֔יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>to the harvest</n> וְהִמְטַרְתִּי֙ <sup>4305 </sup> <n>and I caused it to rain</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> אֶחָ֔ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>upon one</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> אַחַ֖ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>upon another</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אַמְטִ֑יר <sup>4305 </sup> <n>and caused it not to rain</n> חֶלְקָ֤ה <sup>2513 </sup> <n>piece</n> אַחַת֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> תִּמָּטֵ֔ר <sup>4305 </sup> <n>was rained</n> וְחֶלְקָ֛ה <sup>2513 </sup> <n>upon and the piece</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תַמְטִ֥יר <sup>4305 </sup> <n>whereupon it rained</n> עָלֶ֖יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>not withered</n>
8: וְנָע֡וּ <sup>5128 </sup> <n>wandered</n> שְׁתַּיִם֩ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>So two</n> שָׁלֹ֨שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>[or] three</n> עָרִ֜ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עִ֥יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> אַחַ֛ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>unto one</n> לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <sup>8354 </sup> <n>to drink</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִשְׂבָּ֑עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>but they were not satisfied</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>yet have ye not returned</n> עָדַ֖י <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to Me</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>unto me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
9: הִכֵּ֣יתִי <sup>5221 </sup> <n>I have smitten</n> אֶתְכֶם֮ <sup>853 </sup> בַּשִּׁדָּפ֣וֹן <sup>7711 </sup> <n>you with blasting</n> וּבַיֵּרָקוֹן֒ <sup>3420 </sup> <n>and mildew</n> הַרְבּ֨וֹת <sup>7235 </sup> <n>increased</n> גַּנּוֹתֵיכֶ֧ם <sup>1593 </sup> <n>when your gardens</n> וְכַרְמֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>and your vineyards</n> וּתְאֵנֵיכֶ֥ם <sup>8384 </sup> <n>and your fig trees</n> וְזֵיתֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>2132 </sup> <n>and your olive trees</n> יֹאכַ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>devoured</n> הַגָּזָ֑ם <sup>1501 </sup> <n>the palmerworm</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[them] yet have ye not returned</n> עָדַ֖י <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to Me</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>unto me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
10: שִׁלַּ֨חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>I have sent</n> בָכֶ֥ם דֶּ֙בֶר֙ <sup>1698 </sup> <n>among you the pestilence</n> בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>after the manner</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> הָרַ֤גְתִּי <sup>2026 </sup> <n>have I slain</n> בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> בַּח֣וּרֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>970 </sup> <n>your young men</n> עִ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>along</n> שְׁבִ֣י <sup>7628 </sup> <n>and have taken away</n> סֽוּסֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>5483 </sup> <n>your horses</n> וָאַעֲלֶ֞ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>to come up</n> בְּאֹ֤שׁ <sup>889 </sup> <n>and I have made the stink</n> מַחֲנֵיכֶם֙ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of your camps</n> וּֽבְאַפְּכֶ֔ם <sup>639 </sup> <n>unto your nostrils</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>yet have ye not returned</n> עָדַ֖י <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to Me</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>unto me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
11: הָפַ֣כְתִּי <sup>2015 </sup> <n>I have overthrown</n> בָכֶ֗ם כְּמַהְפֵּכַ֤ת <sup>4114 </sup> <n>overthrew</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>[some] of you as God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> סְדֹ֣ם <sup>5467 </sup> <n>Sodom</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֲמֹרָ֔ה <sup>6017 </sup> <n>and Gomorrah</n> וַתִּהְי֕וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>were like</n> כְּא֖וּד <sup>181 </sup> <n>and ye were as a firebrand</n> מֻצָּ֣ל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>plucked out</n> מִשְּׂרֵפָ֑ה <sup>8316 </sup> <n>of the burning</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>yet have ye not returned</n> עָדַ֖י <sup>5704 </sup> <n>to Me</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>unto me saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> ס
12: לָכֵ֕ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Therefore thus will I do</n> לְּךָ֖ יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto thee O Israel</n> עֵ֚קֶב <sup>6118 </sup> <n>[and] because</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>I will do</n> לָּ֔ךְ הִכּ֥וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>this unto thee prepare</n> לִקְרַאת־ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n>
13: כִּ֡י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּה֩ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> יוֹצֵ֨ר <sup>3335 </sup> <n>For lo he that formeth</n> הָרִ֜ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mountains</n> וּבֹרֵ֣א <sup>1254 </sup> <n>and createth</n> ר֗וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the wind</n> וּמַגִּ֤יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and declareth</n> לְאָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>unto man</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> שֵּׂח֔וֹ <sup>7808 </sup> <n>what [is] his thought</n> עֹשֵׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that maketh</n> שַׁ֙חַר֙ <sup>7837 </sup> <n>the morning</n> עֵיפָ֔ה <sup>5890 </sup> <n>darkness</n> וְדֹרֵ֖ךְ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>and treadeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> בָּ֣מֳתֵי <sup>1116 </sup> <n>upon the high places</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <sup>430 </sup> <n>The God</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n> ס
